Name: Bruised Pomegranate
Ingredients: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: This cocktail sits somewhere in the East River between a Manhattan and a Brooklyn with some Thames Estuary thrown in.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bruised Pomegranate contains 166 calories
